name: Future Fire 1
description: 'Future Fire' is a collection of Sounds designed to take your music production to another level. Containing everything from crispy percussion to beautiful pads, this versatile pack will prove to be helpful time and time again.

name: Waves
description: 'Waves' is a starter pack with the essentials for creating Future Bass or other Electronic genres. It includes 70 premium quality samples, all for free.
